page.title: 10Everyday life in Edenthorpe.
page.content: {Edenthorpe}is developing as a housing and shopping place; a lot of people who live here work in or around Doncaster. On weekdays and on a Saturday the shops are fairly busy with lots of people at the counter, but if you get there too late the shops have sold out. The queues are long so you have to wait several minutes to be served. The roads - {Thorne Road}for example - are noisy and busy with cars. On Sunday it is much more peaceful; the village is quiet, the roads are almost empty. Many people wash their cars, or do jobs around the house, or watch the television. On days like this it is good to walk into Shaw Wood or along some of the local paths where you feel as if you are in the countryside.
